page.description: Search CRLF delimited list and replace all occurences of substring with replacement
page.syntax: New_List as C = word_replace(C string ,C substring ,C replacement )

argument.name: substring
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words or entries.

argument.name: replacement
argument.description: The number of the word or entry to remove.

page.discussion: The WORD_REPLACE() function replaces a word or entry in a CR-LF delimited list.
page.example: dim s as C s = <<%a% bird cow chicken goat %a% ? word_replace(s, "cow", "bull") = bird bull chicken goat
